title: Extreme Price Pressures
itunes:title: Extreme Price Pressures
description:
People are being left to fall through the gaps as a result of 'extreme' price pressures, says West of England Metro Mayor Dan Norris.

Plus: With more than 20,000 patients in hospital positive for Covid-19, Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts gets an update on the virus situation with Oksana Pyzik, from UCL School of Pharmacy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
